    • Uses of CoreGL in de.lessvoid.textureatlas

      Constructors in de.lessvoid.textureatlas with parameters of type CoreGL 
      Constructor and Description
      CoreTextureAtlasGenerator(CoreGL gl, int width, int height)
      Prepare a RenderToTexture target of the given width x height that will be used as the rendering target for the texture atlas algorithm.
